Mageia

Mageia is a community driven GNU/Linux operating system backed by a non-profit organization of elected contributors. Initially, it was started as a fork of Mandriva Linux in 2010. Over the years, Mageia has developed a lot and has become a full fledged GNU/Linux distribution with itâ€™s own brand name and identity.

The main motto of Mageia project is told as to build great tools for people. The goal of Mageia project is be a credible and recognizable community in free software world.

Status Active
Home Page https://www.mageia.org
Base distributions
  • Independent

  • GNOME Desktop
